name: Create Sales Order
description:
Test: Create a new sales order in D365
    
    Note: Requires authentication. Skips on BrowserStack.
    
    Steps:
        1. Navigate to Sales Orders
        2. Create new order
        3. Select customer
        4. Select delivery mode
        5. Add item
        6. Cancel order (cleanup)
descriptionHtml:
Test: Create a new sales order in D365

Note: Requires authentication. Skips on BrowserStack.

Steps:
    1. Navigate to Sales Orders
    2. Create new order
    3. Select customer
    4. Select delivery mode
    5. Add item
    6. Cancel order (cleanup)
